name: jsnetworkx
description: A graph processing and visualization library for JavaScript (port of NetworkX for Python).

scripts.build:node: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js src/ node/
scripts.build:node:dev: rm -rf node/ && node scripts/build-node.js --dev src/ node/
scripts.build:browser: (export JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE=jsnetworkx.js; npm run build:node && rm -f $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE && browserify node/browser.js -s jsnx | uglifyjs -cmo $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE)
scripts.build:browser:dev: (export JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; npm run build:node:dev && rm -f $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE && NODE_ENV=dev browserify node/browser.js -ds jsnx > $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE)
scripts.watch:browser: (export JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE=jsnetworkx-dev.js; rm -f $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE && NODE_ENV=dev watchify src/browser.js -t ./transforms/es7 -vds jsnx -o $JSNETWORKX_BUNDLE)
scripts.test: npm run build:node:dev && npm run test:fast
scripts.cover: npm run build:node && nom run cover:fast
